courses.name: Bonneville Golf Course
courses.address: 954 Connor St, Salt Lake City, UT 84108
courses.description: A classic Salt Lake course with rolling hills and scenic views of the valley. Known for its fast greens and great layout.

courses.name: Mountain Dell Golf Course
courses.address: Interstate 80, Exit 134, Salt Lake City, UT 84109
courses.description: A beautiful mountain course just 15 minutes from downtown Salt Lake. Features two 18-hole layouts surrounded by forest and wildlife.

courses.name: Nibley Park Golf Course
courses.address: 2780 S 700 E, Salt Lake City, UT 84106
courses.description: A friendly and accessible 9-hole course, perfect for beginners and quick rounds. Offers a relaxed community atmosphere.

courses.name: Old Mill Golf Course
courses.description: A modern, scenic course overlooking the Salt Lake Valley. Known for elevation changes and panoramic mountain views.

courses.name: Fore Lakes Golf Course
courses.description: A well-maintained public course with both 9-hole and 18-hole options. Ideal for family outings and casual play.

courses.name: Stonebridge Golf Club
courses.address: 4415 Links Dr, West Valley City, UT 84120
courses.description: A 27-hole championship facility offering a challenging layout with water features and professional conditions.

courses.name: Rose Park Golf Course
courses.address: 1386 N Redwood Rd, Salt Lake City, UT 84116
courses.description: A flat, walkable course great for all skill levels. Features tree-lined fairways and a relaxed, welcoming atmosphere.

courses.name: Glendale Golf Course
courses.address: 1630 W 2100 S, Salt Lake City, UT 84119
courses.description: A recently redesigned course offering open fairways and water hazards. Great for a quick 18-hole round close to downtown.

courses.name: Murray Parkway Golf Course
courses.address: 6345 S Murray Pkwy Ave, Murray, UT 84123
courses.description: A scenic course along the Jordan River Parkway with wide fairways, water hazards, and beautiful mountain views.

courses.name: Riverbend Golf Course
courses.description: A challenging course with tight fairways and water in play on many holes. Popular among locals for its layout and condition.

courses.name: South Mountain Golf Club
courses.description: A hillside course with dramatic elevation changes and spectacular views of the Salt Lake Valley. Designed by David Graham and Gary Panks.

courses.name: Thanksgiving Point Golf Club
courses.description: A championship-caliber course designed by Johnny Miller. Known for its length, difficulty, and beautiful landscaping along the Jordan River.
